body:
So There are a lot of hackers on Avicus right? Yeah. What if, there was a DTM lobby reserved for hackers. So if a player was caught on regular DTM, they could be sent to HackerDTM. 
This could also be a new way of fun and banter; just go to the HackerDTM, turn on Bhop, fly, etc., and play around. 

Of of course the stats in the HackerDTM, won't be recorded onto the real leaderboards. But yeah.

-rattle

title: NEW gamemode idea

replies.body: people don't hack to play, people just hack to be annoyances because they have nothing better to do with their life

People hack because they 1) suck at PvP and want to be "best" for once or because 2) it's just fun to annoy people

Lmao, HackerDTM
